spell.name: Nourishing Aura
entries: Comforting cocoa steam billows from you in a 10-foot radius.
At the start of each creature’s turn, you may choose one creature in the aura (including yourself) to regain {@damage 1d4} hit points. A creature can benefit only once per round.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Milk Barrier
entries: You conjure a wavering wall of opaque milk up to 15 feet long, 10 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall provides half cover (three-quarters cover against ranged weapon attacks made through it).

The barrier blocks vision but not movement; however, a creature that passes through the wall for the first time on a turn must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the turn.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, the wall’s length increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Sweet Aid
entries: A target creature regains {@damage 1d8 + @mod} hit points and gains {@damage 1d4} temporary hit points.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The healing increases by {@dice 1d8}, and the temporary hit points increase by {@dice 1d4}, for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cocoa Lash
entries: You whip out a ribbon of dense cocoa at one creature. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw.
* **Failure:** The creature takes {@damage 3d4} bludgeoning damage and is pulled 5 feet toward you.
* **Success:** The creature takes half damage and isn’t pulled.

spell.name: Dairy Ward
entries: A soothing film of fermented cream coats the target. It gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class and advantage on saving throws against poison for the spell’s duration.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, the AC bonus increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st (to a maximum of +3).

spell.name: Caramel Snare
entries: You conjure a pool of sticky caramel in a 5-foot radius centered on a point you can see. The ground is difficult terrain.

When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be restrained for the spell’s duration. A restrained creature can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.
